text: Jordi Mestre Molina (14 September 1981 - 6 June 2020), best known as Jordi Mestre, was a Spanish actor and model. He became famous for his work as reporter on the successful Spanish TV show SÃ© lo que hicisteis.... He was born in Esplugues de Llobregat, Province of Barcelona. Mestre was killed in a motorcycle crash in Madrid on 6 June 2020, aged 38. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Road accident deaths Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish television actors Category:Spanish voice actors Category:Spanish models Category:People from Catalonia
